documents.content: Red chili powder is made from dried red chillies ground into a fine powder. It adds heat and color to dishes. Available in various heat levels from mild to very hot.
Garam masala is a blend of ground spices common in Indian cuisine. Contains cumin, coriander, cardamom, cloves, black pepper, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
Turmeric powder has anti-inflammatory properties and is essential in curry dishes. Adds golden color and earthy flavor. Known for health benefits.
How to place an order: Add items to cart, proceed to checkout, enter shipping address, select payment method (COD available), and confirm order.
Shipping policy: Free shipping on orders above Rs. 1000. Standard delivery takes 3-5 business days. TCS courier available for outside Lahore.
Return and refund policy: Products can be returned within 7 days of delivery. Item must be unused and in original packaging. Full refund processed within 5-7 business days.
Pickle varieties include mango pickle, mixed vegetable pickle, and lemon pickle. Made with traditional recipes using authentic spices and premium ingredients.
Payment methods: We accept Cash on Delivery (COD) for all orders. Online payment options coming soon. No hidden charges.
Kashmiri red chili is known for its vibrant color and mild heat. Perfect for adding color to dishes without making them too spicy.
Track your order: Use your order ID or email to track shipment status. Tracking information updated within 24 hours of dispatch.
How to return your order: Products can be returned within 7 days of delivery. Items must be unused and in original packaging. Initiate return through your account or contact support.
Shipping costs: Free shipping on orders above Rs. 1000. Standard delivery Rs. 150. TCS courier Rs. 200 for outside Lahore. Estimated delivery 3-5 business days.
Refund process: Refunds processed within 5-7 business days after return approval. Amount credited to original payment method or store credit as per your choice.
Order cancellation: Orders can be cancelled within 2 hours of placement. After dispatch, cancellation not possible but you can return upon delivery.
Product quality guarantee: All products are sourced from certified suppliers. Quality checked before dispatch. 100% money-back guarantee if not satisfied.
Contact support: Available Monday-Saturday 9 AM to 6 PM. Email: support@delhimirch.com, WhatsApp: +92-300-1234567, Phone: 042-123456789.
Bulk orders: Special discounts available for bulk purchases. Minimum order 10kg. Contact our sales team for custom quotes and packaging options.
Gift packaging: Complimentary gift packaging available on request. Custom gift messages can be added. Perfect for festivals and special occasions.
Product warranty: All products come with quality guarantee. Defective items can be replaced within 14 days. Electronics have 6-month manufacturer warranty.
Payment security: All transactions are encrypted with SSL. We never store complete card details. Support for COD, credit/debit cards, and online banking.
Delivery options: Standard delivery 3-5 days, Express delivery 1-2 days (extra charges apply). Free delivery on orders above Rs. 1000 within Lahore.
Order tracking: Track your order using order ID or email. Real-time updates via SMS and email. Tracking link sent within 24 hours of dispatch.
Product freshness: All spices are packed fresh upon order. Best before dates clearly mentioned. Store in cool, dry place for maximum freshness.
Loyalty program: Earn 1 point per Rs. 100 spent. Redeem points for discounts. VIP members get early access to sales and exclusive deals.
Recipe suggestions: Each product page includes recipe ideas. Subscribe to our newsletter for weekly recipe inspiration using our products.
